attributes.action: To change the school curriculum and not to judge us based on tests
attributes.background: So instead of us focusing on competition in tests .For is to focus on collaboration. No more common core ( Focusing on maths and English the most) Let us express ourselves the way we want to (Music Drama;etc) To change the curriculum so kids enjoy school and actually want to go

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you would like changes to the school curriculum, but are not sure what changes you would like.

You could start a new petition calling for music and drama to be made compulsory GCSE subjects, if that is something you would like to see happen.
